::Kluster/Firearm/Rex/Proto/Grimmler/Shredder::

Kluster reaches the bridge, sitting down at a console and tapping a 
few buttons. The transmission Zardus had sent a while ago was being 
played back on one of the other terminals.

Kluster frowns, listening to it. He tapps a few buttons, bringing up a 
scan to confirm Zardus' words. There was indeed Predacon activity...

He gets up. "Allright, the Maximals need to meet," he says to 
Shredder, walking out of the bridge with Shredder following him. He 
activates his comm-link, sending a transmission to all Maximals.

"All Maximals, report to the Cybertronian Fire conference room 
immediately. There are some issues that need to be discussed."

Kluster enters the conference room, Shredder motioning for Ramjet to 
follow and then entering behind him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm recieves Kluster's transmission as he is walking out of 
Spears' room.

"Want to go report to the meeting first? Or should we get this over 
with?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rex looks around as he hears Kluster's transmission, looking at 
Whistler.

"Kluster wants the Maximals to meet in the conference room. You're a 
Maximal, right?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Proto and Grimmler get out of their CR chambers, setting of for the 
conference room.
